title: F1 [2013][Racing]
description:
F1 2013 (c) Codemasters

10/2013 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: SteamCEG
1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Racing / Simulation

Make history in FORMULA ONE F1 2013 features all the cars, stars and
circuits from the 2013 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP plus, for the
first time, classic content. F1 Classics is an expansive new game mode,
introduced by legendary broadcaster Murray Walker, in which youll race
legendary drivers in famous cars on iconic circuits from the 1980s
This classic content can be played in a range of modes including
split-screen and online multiplayer.

F1 2013 also features all of the new drivers, team moves, tyre changes
and remodelled handling to recreate the thrill of racing 2013s stunning
roster of FORMULA ONE cars. New enhancements, improvements plus new,
expanded and returning game modes combine to deliver the most complete
simulation of a FORMULA ONE season in videogame history

1. Unrar
2. Burn or mount the image
3. Install the game.
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory
5. Play the game
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT
